meanings.sent1: The candy was nonnutritious, meaning it did not give any energy.
meanings.sent2: The chips were nonnutritious, so I chose to eat a salad instead.
meanings.sent3: I tried to convince my friend that nonnutritious snacks were actually healthy, but they didn't believe me.
meanings.sent4: The nonnutritious food left me feeling empty and unsatisfied.
meanings.sent5: The nonnutritious meal was like eating air - no substance at all.

meanings.sent1: The fast food burger was nonnutritious, missing important vitamins and minerals.
meanings.sent2: I avoided the nonnutritious cereal and chose oatmeal for breakfast instead.
meanings.sent3: My attempt at a nonnutritious diet lasted only a day before I craved vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The nonnutritious soil resulted in weak, unhealthy plants in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The nonnutritious snack left me feeling hungry again in no time.

meanings.definition: Offering little to no nutritional value.
meanings.sent1: The sugary drink was nonnutritious, providing only empty calories.
meanings.sent2: I checked the labels to make sure the snacks were not nonnutritious.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that my nonnutritious meal looked more like a science experiment than food.
meanings.sent4: The nonnutritious options at the buffet left me searching for something healthier.
meanings.sent5: The nonnutritious bar left me feeling unsatisfied and craving real food.
